text: The CvsTagDiff task supports passing multiple modules (as does the cvs rdiff command). However, in trying to strip 'File module/' from each line a check is performed to exclude any lines shorter than the length of 'File module/'. If one  specifies several modules, the length of this string can easily exceed the length of the line being evaluated and it will be tossed out.
creator: stevendeal@gmail.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 35301 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
